about_the_game:
Fight in the Battle for Humanity and become a Legend
Welcome to the year of 7351!
500 years ago, Humans were colonizing thousands of star systems in the vast frontiers of the cosmos. Humanity was growing incredibly fast without encountering any serious challenges. The homeworld, Terra, became the pearl of the Galactic Republic, representing an incredible combination of technological and aesthetic development of mankind.

After millennia of prosperity, humanity is on the verge of extinction. Many systems are destroyed or in isolation while the fate of Humanity's cradle is yet to be discovered.It is said that the Terra itself became the epicenter of events that destroyed the era of peace in a matter of days.

You - the heir of the once powerful colonization fleet, whose battle glory is now resembled by only 1 strike and reconnaissance frigate of the long forgotten times — the commander of which you are destined to become. Your journey in search of resources and revenge will take light years, all the while trying to unravel the chronology of events that led to the disaster and gathering the strike force to return the lost homeland.

The galaxy contains thousands of star systems and countless amazing and unique planets. There is a lot of activity out there with many searching for a fortune or a destiny. You'd have to face the consequences of the mistakes of the past on some of those planets and rediscover forgotten technologies. You will also be waiting for the capture and restoration of systems, the development of the plot and the search for ancient technologies of the golden era.


GAMEPLAY
In the future, in the light of devastating losses of the space fleet and complete and total annihilation of the drone army, the main fighting force in ground operations became MECHs - more versatile but technologically sophisticated Combat Strike Systems .
These platforms have direct neural control and excellent surveillance and coordination systems on the battlefield. Onboard systems and equipment can be customized with various types of weapons, protection and technologies. All MECHs are the legacy of the ancient era of colonization.

You are the pilot of the MECH Combat Strike System.
There are small and agile MECHs as well as massive combat striders, capable of leveling entire armies. charge with your MECH into battle , explore the secrets of the planets, improve the equipment and type of your MECH. Create your own retribution machine.
Your task - to destroy any enemy standing on your way of establishing necessary resource bases for the survival of mankind. The resources of the new worlds and the conquest of the lost ones will become the blood of reborn Humanity and you will become the sword of vengeance in its hands.

MECH
The game features many unique MECH models and hundreds of their variations, the ability to combine their elements to create characteristics that can perfectly match your play style as well as a unique damage model depending on the MECH you've assembled. Strong opponents are your investments - defeat them and become stronger by studying their weapons and creating your own technologies. Wreckage and trophies will also help you acquire new parts and equipment to improve your combat performance.
Fight and explore worlds to gain strength for real challenges that lie ahead of your path.

THE LIFE OF A Battle Commander
As the leader of one of the small advanced units, you will have to think through your actions outside the battlefield and discover and build new supply lines for Humanity's prosperity or use them to improve your own technologies and MECHs.


FEATURES OF THE GAME
1)Battle Robots
2)Modular customization system
3)Modules and weapons crafting system
4)prospecting and mining of resources
5)Advanced armor and damage system
6)Open World
7)A variety of biomes and planets

name: Continuum

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I5 gen 10 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1650 or equal
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I7 gen 10 or AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 2060 or equal
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible

short_description: Continuum - become a combat MECH pilot in a brutal environment of the galactic post-apocalypse. In order to survive you'd have to collect resources, search for lost technologies and improve your combat vehicle. Defeat powerful adversaries, survive and become stronger.
